Class Composition

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Composition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Destructable, TLCParent, TransientContainer<Session>

    public class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransientContainer<Session>, TLCParent, Destructable
    An actual composition, the parent of everything else

    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI
